detail_desc: Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
High-waisted skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Hat in felted fabric with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Shaping briefs in lace and sturdy microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the waist.
Shopper in a jute and cotton blend with two handles at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. The cotton content of the shopper is organic.
Tights with a mid waist. 60 denier. Some of the polyamide content of the tights is recycled.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details and a brushed thermal inside. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip, and a zipped key pocket at the back. Ventilating holes under the arms and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Size of key pocket 11x18 cm.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Adjustable ankle straps with concealed elastication and a metal buckle, block heels and a welt seam around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with flounced trims, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the side, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Shirt in a soft linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Cap with a mesh back, a lightly padded front with an appliqué, and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted cotton flannel blouse with beaded embroidery at the top, a tapered waist and concealed zip at the back. Long raglan sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuff.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a skeleton print. Matching, printed hood with holes for the eyes and mouth. Hook and loop fastening at the back.
Thin metal chain necklace with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 43-51 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in lace with a small stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long, slightly wider sleeves and cuffs with press-studs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a visible zip fly and wide, gently flared legs with sewn-in creases.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw, roll-edge hems.

Jacket in airy linen with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. One chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves with ribbing along the top, and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Short necklace in different designs of thin metal chains. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm.
Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, two buttons, a zip fly, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Suede gloves with decorative stitching on the uppers. Soft, knitted lining.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a narrow collar, zip down the front and long, cuffed sleeves with a zip. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, inner pockets, and a straight hem with an adjustable tab at the back. Unlined.
Textured swimsuit with a flounce around the neckline and down the shoulder straps at the back. Lined front.

Baseball jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and jetted front pockets. Contrasting colour sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in soft, stretch velvet jersey with a square neckline, long puff sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Set with a shirt in a checked cotton weave and pair of trousers in stretch cotton corduroy. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud, and front and back pockets.
V-neck jumpsuit in airy crêpe fabric with a sewn-in wrapover and seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Short sleeves with a decorative tie at the cuffs and wide, ankle-length legs.

Short, straight-cut dress in an airy plumeti weave with crinkled sections. Opening with ties at the top and short sleeves with gathered hems. Seam at the waist with a small frill and a flared skirt with a tier at the hem for added volume. Jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit cardigan in soft organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Long-sleeved dress and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flannel shirt in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Shirt in cotton denim with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a chiffon crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and tiered flounces. Satin underskirt.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top, low dropped shoulders and wide 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the hem and decorative gathers at the back of the neck, shoulders and sleeves. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Hat in a soft fine knit with a pattern and a ribbed hem.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in jersey with a glitter print, press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch, and a glittery tulle skirt.

Shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, sleeves with a slit and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide trim at the hem. Light support.
Imitation suede ballet pumps with one open side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Ribbing around the neckline and an open chest pocket.
Short lace skirt with a concealed zip in the side and box pleats. Lined.
Calf-length circular skirt in tulle with a high waist and wide elastic waistband. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.

Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Rounded front pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, straight legs with creases and a slit at the front.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with notch lapels, an off-centre zip down the front and zipped side pockets. The jacket is lined in soft faux fur and the pockets in recycled polyester.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a detachable belt with metal rings.
Padded fancy dress mask in soft pile with an elastic strap at the back.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This timeless sweatshirt is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
